questions.question_text:
A developer is using AWS CodeDeploy to launch an application onto Amazon EC2 instances. The application deployment fails during testing. The developer notices an IAM_ROLE_PERMISSIONS error code in Amazon CloudWatch logs.

What should the developer do to resolve the error?

choices.A: Ensure that the deployment group is using the correct role name for the CodeDeploy service role.
choices.D: Ensure the CodeDeploy agent is installed and running on all instances in the deployment group.
choices.C: Attach the AWSCodeDeployRole policy to the CodeDeploy service role.
choices.B: Attach the AWSCodeDeployRoleECS policy to the CodeDeploy service role.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
IAM_ROLE_PERMISSIONS indica que el rol que CodeDeploy utiliza no tiene los permisos necesarios. La política estándar para CodeDeploy en instancias EC2 es AWSCodeDeployRole, la cual debe estar adjunta al rol del servicio de CodeDeploy.

choices.A: Use AWS X-Ray. Enable active tracing for Amazon SNS.
choices.D: Use Amazon GuardDuty. Enable runtime monitoring.
choices.C: Use AWS CloudTrail to log all Amazon SNS API calls.
choices.B: Use the Amazon CloudWatch NumberOfNotificationsFailed metric.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
A. AWS X-Ray with active tracing:
This is exactly what we need because:

X-Ray provides detailed tracing of messages through the SNS FIFO topics
It shows the complete path of each message, including timing information
You can see exactly how long each notification takes to process and deliver
It provides visualization tools to help spot bottlenecks and issues
You can track both throughput and latency in real-time
✅ CORRECT

Selected Answer: A
D can't be as Amazon GuardDuty is a threat detection service, not a monitoring tool for performance metrics like notification rate or latency.

Selected Answer: A
I vote A: https://docs.aws.amazon.com/xray/latest/devguide/xray-services-sns.html

Both B and C don't make sense to me
D is not suitable as its Designed for security threat detection.

questions.question_text:
A company wants to send notifications to customers to advertise a sale on the company’s products. The company needs to use Amazon Simple Notification Service (Amazon SNS) FIFO topics.

The company needs to examine the rate at which the topics send notifications and the latency with which the topics send notifications.

Which solution will meet these requirements with the MOST operational efficiency?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
Lambda permite aumentar el almacenamiento efímero (/tmp) hasta 10 GB. Al aumentar este almacenamiento a 2 GB y copiar el archivo desde S3 a /tmp, el procesamiento I/O intensivo se realiza localmente, reduciendo la latencia y evitando múltiples lecturas directamente desde S3

questions.question_text:
A cloud-based video surveillance company is developing an application that analyzes video files. After the application analyzes the files, the company can discard the files.

The company stores the files in an Amazon S3 bucket. The files are 1 GB in size on average. No file is larger than 2 GB. An AWS Lambda function will run one time for each video file that is processed. The processing is very I/O intensive, and the application must read each file multiple times.

Which solution will meet these requirements in the MOST performance-optimized way?

choices.D: Configure the Lambda function code to read the video files directly from the S3 bucket.
choices.C: Increase the ephemeral storage size to 2 GB. Copy the files from the S3 bucket to the /tmp directory of the Lambda function.
choices.B: Attach an Elastic Network Adapter (ENA) to the Lambda function. Use the ENA to read the video files from the S3 bucket.
choices.A: Attach an Amazon Elastic Block Store (Amazon EBS) volume that is larger than 1 GB to the Lambda function. Copy the files from the S3 bucket to the EBS volume.

questions.question_text:
A company has an AWS Step Functions state machine named myStateMachine. The company configured a service role for Step Functions.

The developer must ensure that only the myStateMachine state machine can assume the service role.

Which statement should the developer add to the trust policy to meet this requirement?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
A: the "myStateMachine" from specific account.

choices.C: Use AWS Key Management Service (AWS KMS) to implement encryption in the S3 bucket. Re-upload all the existing S3 objects. Give the kms:Decrypt permission to the analytics service.
choices.A: Load the S3 objects into Amazon Redshift by using a COPY command. Implement dynamic data masking. Refactor the analytics service to read from Amazon Redshift.
choices.B: Set up an S3 Object Lambda function. Attach the function to an S3 Object Lambda Access Point. Program the function to call a PII redaction API.
choices.D: Create an Amazon Simple Notification Service (Amazon SNS) topic. Implement message data protection. Refactor the analytics service to publish data access requests to the SNS topic.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
B is the correct answer

Selected Answer: B
Con S3 Object Lambda puedes interceptar las solicitudes GET a objetos en S3 y ejecutar Lambda para cambios antes de que lleguen al consumidor.

questions.question_text:
A company stores customer credit reports in an Amazon S3 bucket. An analytics service uses standard Amazon S3 GET requests to access the reports.

A developer must implement a solution to redact personally identifiable information (PII) from the reports before the reports reach the analytics service.

Which solution will meet this requirement with the MOST operational efficiency?
